text:
Yoga Syahputra (8 February 1983 – 27 March 2015) was an Indonesian actor, comedian, and singer.
Career.
Yoga was born to Nur and Nurhida Rachman. He was the oldest of their seven children. His first job as an actor was in "Lenong Bocah". Unfortunately the guy bleed Minang's - Javanese is required to participate in the first practice "Studio Ananda". Because he did not have enough money, Olga sold a refrigerator to pay his school fees to take classes at a Studio Ananda. Olga friend, Bertrand which then lend a hand with Olga bought a new refrigerator.
